name: Santa's Survival
description:
Software:

Unity (2D) C#

Photoshop

Objective:

Santa's old elves have risen from the grave to take vengeance on him for forcing them to work their entire lives on minimum wage with no breaks! To ensure that capitalism flourishes Santa must use his own presents as well as some pure American steel to defend the factory and build a wall.

Other:

Despite the long weekend and challenging moments I found that I quite enjoyed making this game and I learnt quite a lot ; especially in the later stages. In the future I would almost certainly aspire to create a smaller project with more polish and refinement since here I didn't have the time to.
